General.Name: Middle East Healthcare Co CJSC
General.Description: Middle East Healthcare Company, a healthcare provider, owns and operates a network of hospitals under the Saudi German Hospital name in the Middle East and North Africa. The company operates multi-specialty tertiary care hospitals, which comprise Saudi German Hospital"Jeddah with 218 beds; Saudi German Hospital-Aseer with 400 beds; Saudi German Hospital-Riyadh with 300 beds; Saudi German Hospital-Madinah with 300 beds; and Saudi German Hospital-Hail with 150 beds. Its multi-specialty tertiary care hospitals also include Saudi German Hospital-Dammam with 150 to 300 beds; Saudi German Hospital"Dubai with 300 beds; Saudi German Hospital"Sharjah with 50 beds; Saudi German Hospital"Ajman with 100 to 200 beds; and Saudi German Hospital-Cairo with 300 beds. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Middle East Healthcare Company operates as a subsidiary of Bait Al Batterjee Medical Co. Ltd.
